description:
There are currently two queen beds in the room but one or both can be removed if desired.

New York is truly at your fingertips from this centrally located apartment. One of NYC's largest subway stations is less than 5 minutes away, granting you easy access to the majority of Manhattan and much of Brooklyn. The East Village is the mecca of food so there are tons of amazing restaurants and bars nearby! Our wifi is super fast and have a (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)p projector screen.

The space is amazing with private bathroom and private patio (a true rarity in New York)!
name: East Village Sublet - Private Bath & Patio
review: The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
